DateType.description: Required. The date type that forecast amounts are based on.

DeveloperName.description: Required. The name of the forecast type.

FullName.description: The full name of the forecast type.

HasProductFamily.description: Required. Indicates whether the forecast type includes product families (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

Language.description: The language of the forecast type.

MasterLabel.description: Required. Controlling label for this forecast type. This display value is the internal label that doesnâ€™t get translated.

Metadata.description: The metadata of the forecast type.

OpportunitySplitTypeId.description: For a forecast type based on a split, the ID of the opportunity split type.

OpptyLineItemSplitTypeId.description: For a forecast type based on an opportunity product split, the ID of the opportunity line item split type.

RoleType.description: Required. Indicates whether the role type has a ForecastingType, and if so, which ForecastingType.

Territory2ModelId.description: For a territory-based forecast type, the ID of the Territory2 model.
